column2: All Formations of the Council of Death cannot be auto-hit by criticals and can roll their defense against critical damage just as any other damage
If a Unit dies within 12inches of this Formation, it rolls a Will check, on a success, the creature is revived as a Minion and is attached to this Formation.
Minions of the Halls Of Order grant one damage to all successful hits and 1 HP to the Hero they are attached to
